channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Dead deer, 2nd September
item.description:
Dear deer on grass verge opposite the BS Honeybees site on Hucclecote Lane approaching Churchdown. (51.8672974, -2.1664698)
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Hucclecote Lane, Churchdown, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Broken public bicycle pump, 2nd September
item.description:
The public bicycle pump on the pedestrianised high street near Next and Savers is broken, and has been for a year or two now. Please could it be repaired or replaced?

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 141, High Street, Fairview, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Flytipping here again, 2nd September
item.description:
Paper and electrical waste and a soft toy, almost all of it perfectly usable.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Princess Elizabeth Way, Kingsditch, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Road surface degrading, 2nd September
item.description:
The tarmac on Oldfield Crescent is crumbling in 2 places outside number 1 and number 5. This is creating some big steps in the road surface. Please could you see about repairing it?

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 3, Oldfield Crescent, Hatherley, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Large pothole, 2nd September
item.description:
Large pothole been here for weeks , potential damage to wheel and hazardous for motorcycles
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): M5, Churchdown, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Gas manhole missing, 1st September
item.description:
Gas manhole is missing leaving deep hole in pavement outside 8 Suffolk Road, Cheltenham
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Suffolk Road, Montpellier, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Pothole, 1st September
item.description:
Sunken area on inside lane. Southbound carriageway approx half mile north of J11. Potentially damaging and dangerous and there for at least five weeks.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): M5, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Terrible\dangerous road condition, 1st September
item.description:
The road surface is dangerous and very uneven. It is only a matter of time before an accident happens when a tyre blows out or a motorcycle hits it! I have reported it at least twice and yet nothing is done!!! Please can you address this problem as a matter or urgency. It is on the middle lane on the Southbound motorway near Junction 11a.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): M5, Hucclecote, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Tarmac needs Repair, 1st September
item.description:
Tarmac is crumbling and I do not walk well as I have Rheumatoid ARTHRITIS.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 19, Peter Pennell Close, Kingsditch, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Graffiti on black bin, 30th August
item.description:
Graffiti on black council rubbish bin on corner of st stephens rd and Hatherley Court Rd
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 87, The Park, Warden Hill, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Pothole, 29th August
item.description:
Quite a serious pothole about 1/2 mile before the junction southbound in the inside lane..our car seems to have survived it but it was a large bump, could be potentially bad for a bike
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): M5, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Failed pedestrian crossing lights, 29th August
item.description:
A40 Lansdown Road - crossing close to (East side of) junction with Shelburne Road. Total failure of traffic lights at pedestrian crossing. Lights totally out, call buttons to activate crossing not working. Needs fixing ASAP as crossing is well-used - even more so once schools return at start of September.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 88, Lansdown Road, Warden Hill, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Lots of potholes and patches in the road on the turning, 29th August
item.description:
This road has been like this since I moved in over a year ago, thereâ€™s always patch works done but driving down this road everyday is a nightmare and the more that there are patches done the worse it gets

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 1a, Elmfield Avenue, Wymans Brook, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Potholes and speeding buses, 29th August
item.description:
The whole of Prestbury Road needs to be resurfaced - the surface is so bad that the buses and lorries are causing our house to shake when they drive past at speed. The same must be happening to other houses on this stretch between the roundabout and the service station. There is also a problem with buses going far too fast - especially the Marchants buses leaving or returning to the depot. Please resurface this road - patching up the odd pothole is not working
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 69, Prestbury Road, Lynworth, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Overgrown vegetation, 28th August
item.description:
Brambles are sticking our over the pavement which forces pedestrians into the cycle lane. Not sure who is responsible for ensuring these are cut back sufficiently to avoid scratching pedestrians, especially children (in pushchairs) who are in danger of being scratched in the face.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Lansdown Road, Warden Hill, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Blocked drains, 26th August
item.description:
Water covers footpath where drains are blocked from Newlands traffic lights to roundabout. This forces pedestrians to walk oin the road which is a very busy 40mph road.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Hyde Lane, Bishop's Cleeve
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Door in brook, 26th August
item.description:
A wooden door frame is in the brook.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 97, Denman Avenue, Wymans Brook, Cheltenham
